backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user management, access control, document storage, and category/office structures with admin‑restricted mutations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking new mobile navigation, role‑based visibility, and mobile layout requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing routing, layout, document features, styling, and utility modules.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions providing light/dark theme tokens and base styling across the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads the React app via main.tsx and defines the root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with role‑guarded routes wrapped in AppShell and AuthGate, including admin‑only settings.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate showing an Internet Identity login screen until the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑enforcement wrapper that blocks access with an unauthorized screen if caller role does not meet user/admin requirements.
frontend/src/components/auth/Unauthorize: Unauthorized access screen with an alert icon and optional button returning the user to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/documents/Docume: Provides actions for viewing, downloading, and deleting a document, including confirmation dialogs and UI menus.
Renders document filter controls for search, category, office, direction, and date range with automatic state handling.
Displays a table of documents with selection, navigation, and category/office/direction metadata.
frontend/src/components/documents/EmptyS: Shows a placeholder view encouraging users to upload a document when none are present.
Defines the main application layout with header navigation, theme toggle, and user menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Implements a mobile dropdown navigation menu with links and admin‑only options.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCallerRole: Fetches and exposes the caller’s user role using React Query and actor APIs.
frontend/src/features/categories/useCate: Loads the list of categories from the backend via the actor using React Query.
Provides mutations for adding, updating, and removing categories and offices with cache invalidation and toasts.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/useDashb: Fetches dashboard metrics from the backend using the actor and React Query.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDelet: Provides a mutation hook to delete a document and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDocum: Fetches a single document by ID using the actor and react-query.
Fetches and filters document lists with pagination and search support.
frontend/src/features/documents/useUploa: Handles document upload, converting files to base64 and adding metadata to backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity management context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and custom utilities.
frontend/src/lib/categoryHelpers.ts: Utility functions for formatting and listing category options.
frontend/src/lib/exportDocuments.ts: Converts documents to CSV format and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/lib/officeHelpers.ts: Provides helper functions for office option lists and name lookup.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility for merging Tailwind class names with clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard UI showing categories, metrics, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed information for a single document, including metadata, preview, and actions with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentListPage.tsx: Shows a filterable, searchable, and selectable list of documents with CSV export support and infinite loading.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides interfaces to add, edit, and remove categories and offices using dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/UploadDocumentPage.ts: Handles uploading new documents with metadata fields, validation, progress tracking, and success state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the current state of the Document Archive project, including mobile navigation issues and pending custom domain and hamburger-menu feature requests. Lists existing features, known issues, and architectural metadata.
